name: sandbox
value:
Unordered set of unique space-separated tokens, ASCII case-insensitive, consisting of
          "allow-forms",
          "allow-modals",
          "allow-orientation-lock",
          "allow-pointer-lock",
          "allow-popups",
          "allow-popups-to-escape-sandbox",
          "allow-presentation",
          "allow-same-origin",
          "allow-scripts" and
          "allow-top-navigation"
